root: ^Welcome, friend, to the sanctuary of peace and enlightenment.
^We seek to understand the teachings of the Buddha and cultivate compassion and wisdom in our hearts.
^In Buddhism, we strive to free ourselves from suffering and attain true happiness by following the Noble Eightfold Path.
^This path consists of right understanding, right intention, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right concentration.
^My friend, I invite you to embark on this journey of self-discovery and spiritual growth with an open heart and a humble spirit.
^May you find solace in the teachings of the Buddha and awaken to the true nature of existence.
^May peace and enlightenment be your guides on the path to liberation. Namo Buddhaya.
